Value: Mosaic Brands Limited engages in the retail of women's apparel and accessories in Australia and New Zealand. It operates through two segments, Fashion Retail and Multi-Channel Retail. The company sells its products under the Millers, Rockmans, Noni B, Rivers, Katies, Autograph, W. Lane, Crossroads, beme, and Ezibuy brand names. It operates through a network of 1,100 stores and online digital department platforms. The company was formerly known as Noni B Limited and changed its name to Mosaic Brands Limited in November 2019. Mosaic Brands Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Rosebery, Australia.
